channel.title: Error compile....?!
channel.description:
USING P16 V6 ..... MAYBE THAT IS THE PROBLEM?????????
hi guys im john (johnny_scape) i got kinda a problem.. check this plz :confused:
help me!!!
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .
error?????
i placed this in ??? @echo off COLOR 08 title maddy77.no-ip.info Client "C:\Program files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause
and i do got moparscape 3,2 and i got java update 9.. jdk and jre
i cant play my own game normal anymore? if i start my own game .. and than start moparscape.. it says ... server down ???? so now i cant play my server in my own anymore.. ??? help me plz

item.title: Error compile....?!
item.dc:creator: @haruki haruki
item.description:
@haruki wrote:

yes you do, compile will still show you the errors but you wont be able to play your server with compile

GOOOOOOOOOOD WORK !!!

U SOLVED THE PROBLEM!!!

IM GONNA REP++ U!!!

THX!!!

ps: so if i do wanna host my server? do i need to compile than to play or runserver?

item.title: Error compile....?!
item.dc:creator: @haruki haruki
item.description:
@haruki wrote:

dony use compile to play ur server, i have same problem, it just cant make java act as a server, use runserver and you can play, use compile to find errors

Read full topic

item.title: Error compile....?!
item.dc:creator: @bloempot99 bloempot99
item.description:
@bloempot99 wrote:

i now … but one thing… a week ago… if i started compile… than started moparscape… than i could play on my server alone… that is what i want… i dont wanna host it yet… so what i want … is that i can play my game with all the npc’s and things that i placed in the game can play… ALONE! u now what the problem is ? or does anyone? or does no one know what i mean with what i sayd ???

Read full topic

item.title: Error compile....?!
item.dc:creator: @bloempot99 bloempot99
item.description:
@bloempot99 wrote:

USING P16 V6 …
MAYBE THAT IS THE PROBLEM???

hi guys im john (johnny_scape)
i got kinda a problem… check this plz

help me!!!

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

error???

i placed this in ???
@echo off
COLOR 08
title maddy77.no-ip.info Client
“C:\Program files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause

and i do got moparscape 3,2 and i got java update 9… jdk and jre

i cant play my own game normal anymore?
if i start my own game … and than start moparscape… it says … server down ???
so now i cant play my server in my own anymore… ???
help me plz
